pkgmetadata.longdescription: Random Sampling Association Rules from a Transaction Dataset // Implements the Gibbs sampling algorithm to randomly sample association rules with one pre-chosen item as the consequent from a transaction dataset. The Gibbs sampling algorithm was proposed in G. Qian, C.R. Rao, X. Sun and Y. Wu (2016) DOI:10.1073/pnas.1604553113.
